title: My pixel 4XL won't turn on at all. I tried literally everything!
content: I tried literally everything I could find on the internet but it won't respond at all. I'm really carefull with my phone and have a really good case on it. Lately the phone was already acting weird and it turned off a lot without a reason, but that was an easy fix. I just had to plug my phone to the charger and it turned on. But now it really seems dead and unresponsive.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
